programme.title: Masters Film - 2022 Scheffler
programme.desc: The official film of the 2022 Masters at Augusta National, the year that Scottie Scheffler of America dominated the field to become the first Major winner of the year.

programme.title: Masters Film: Watson 2014
programme.desc: The story of the 2014 Masters Tournament from the Augusta National Golf Club in Georgia. Defending champion Adam Scott was targeting back-to-back Masters titles.

programme.title: Masters Round 2 Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from day two of the 2025 Masters. Justin Rose took a three-shot lead over Scottie Scheffler into Friday's second round, with Rory McIlroy fighting to recover lost ground. (11.04)

programme.title: Masters Film: Weir 2003
programme.desc: A chance to relive the 2003 Masters Tournament from Augusta. Canadian Mike Weir triumphed in a playoff to win his first and only Major, and become the first from his country to do so.

programme.title: 1986: Jack's Glorious 18th
programme.desc: A Masters special celebrating the 30th anniversary of Jack Nicklaus' 1986 victory in Augusta. The Golden Bear seized his final and a record 18th major with victory at Augusta.

programme.title: Masters Round 2 Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from day two of the 2025 Masters. Justin Rose took a three-shot lead over Scottie Scheffler into Friday's second round, with Rory McIlroy fighting to recover lost ground. (11.04)

programme.title: Masters Films: Woods 2002
programme.desc: A chance to relive the 2002 Masters Tournament from the Augusta National Golf Club in Georgia. Tiger Woods came into the tournament looking to win back-to-back Masters titles.

programme.title: Masters Round 2 Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from day two of the 2025 Masters. Justin Rose took a three-shot lead over Scottie Scheffler into Friday's second round, with Rory McIlroy fighting to recover lost ground. (11.04)

programme.title: Masters Film: Woods 2005
programme.desc: The story of the 2005 Masters from Augusta National Golf Club in Georgia. Phil Mickelson was victorious the previous year, doing enough to edge out South African Ernie Els.

programme.title: Masters Official Film - Woods 2019
programme.desc: The official film of the 2019 Masters from the Augusta National Golf Club. It was to be a memorable event capped by one of the most remarkable sporting comebacks of all time.

programme.title: McGinley & Chamblee At The Masters
programme.desc: Join Paul McGinley and Brandel Chamblee as they reflect on the second round of the 2025 Masters and look ahead to another day at Augusta.

programme.title: Masters Round 2 Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from day two of the 2025 Masters. Justin Rose took a three-shot lead over Scottie Scheffler into Friday's second round, with Rory McIlroy fighting to recover lost ground. (11.04)

programme.title: Live Masters Round 3 Build Up
programme.desc: Two off the 36-hole lead held by 44-year-old Justin Rose, Rory McIlroy's pursuit of a Green Jacket is back on. Join third-round build-up from Augusta National as the 2025 Masters continues.

programme.title: Live Masters Round 3
programme.desc: The third round of The Masters from Augusta National Golf Club. A host of contenders line up behind 36-hole leader Justin Rose, including Rory McIlroy in pursuit of the career Grand Slam.

programme.title: Masters Official Film 2023
programme.desc: The official film of the 2023 Masters. It was to be a memorable year for the Spaniard Jon Rahm, who won at the Masters marathon on the birthday of his late compatriot, Seve Ballesteros.

programme.title: Masters Films: Spieth 2015
programme.desc: A film focusing on the Masters tournament, one of golf's majors. This year, American superstar Jordan Spieth claimed the title at the age of just 21.

programme.title: Masters Round 3 Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from round three of 2025 Masters. With Justin Rose's lead trimmed to a single stroke, weekend play began with Bryson DeChambeau and Rory McIlroy in close pursuit. (12.04)

programme.title: Masters Films: Z. Johnson 2007
programme.desc: A chance to relive the 2007 Masters from Augusta National Golf Club. The eventual winner here seized his first major title in what was only his second win on the PGA Tour.

programme.title: Steel Magnolia: Willett's Masters
programme.desc: Relive all of the drama with a look at Danny Willett's 2016 Masters win. The Sheffield man took a stunning final-day victory to win his maiden green jacket.

programme.desc: Highlights from round three of 2025 Masters. With Justin Rose's lead trimmed to a single stroke, weekend play began with Bryson DeChambeau and Rory McIlroy in close pursuit. (12.04)

programme.title: The Last 9 On Sunday
programme.desc: A special programme looking at the particular importance of the back nine on Sunday at the Masters, and how it can be make-or-break for a golfer's Masters aspirations.

programme.desc: Highlights from round three of 2025 Masters. With Justin Rose's lead trimmed to a single stroke, weekend play began with Bryson DeChambeau and Rory McIlroy in close pursuit. (12.04)

programme.desc: Former Masters champion Bernhard Langer discusses his storied career with broadcaster Jim Nantz, including his victories at Augusta National in 1985 and 1993.

programme.desc: Britain's Jack Draper competes in his maiden ATP Masters 1000 final at Indian Wells as the top-10 bound Brit faces Holger Rune. Draper knocked out Carlos Alcaraz in the last four. (16.03)
